title: format
description: semantic format of the instance value
content: This property is a string, that provides more information about the specify type of data the instance represents.
The specification provides some example values:
Any string value is allowed, though, and version 3 provided more example values.
Validation is not guaranteed to use this keyword - it is therefore unwise to use this keyword inside "not", "oneOf" or "anyOf" clauses, as behaviour could be inconsitent across environments.
Jsonary does not use this keyword for validation.
